text: Would it be possible to change the static names in the module "items" properties to show one of the text values in the item? Like this, but instead of Address 1 .. It had a title.

Hi Tom. In my experience if you create a text field as the first field in a field group (aka your module "items") you should see a custom title for each item. I'm not sure how you have your module set up but as you can see in my example, this is what you are wanting I do believe.
You can choose which field shows up there. There is a sort field option when using a repeater field
